Class ec.ez.ezvm.InScopeExpr 

java.lang.Object

                   +----ec.ez.ezvm.InScopeExpr
public class InScopeExpr
extends Expr
BNF: "enterPov" expr block

Evaluate 'expr' in the current scope. It must evaluate to a Scope, in which case, evaluate block in that scope.

See Also:
ScopeExpr, Scope

InScopeExpr(Expr, Expr)
InScopeExpr(InScopeExpr, Object)
